content: Irina Gladkova Ph.d Irina Gladkova Associate Professor, Department Of Computer Science Main menu: Home | Publications | Research Grants | Projects | Teaching Irina Gladkova GLASSLAB CSDIRS Computer Science Department The City College of New York NOAA CREST ABOUT ME Short Bio Publications Research Grants Projects Teaching & Mentoring Ad Personam Irina Gladkova received a B.Sc. degree in mathematics from Donetsk State University, Ukraine, in 1989, a Ph.D. in physical/mathematical sciences from the Institute of Applied Mathematics and Mechanics of the National Academy of Sciences of Ukraine in 1993, and a Ph.D. In Mathematics from The Graduate Center of the City University of New York in 1998. She has been a faculty member of City College of New York since 1998, where she is an Associate Professor in the Department of Computer Science. (Read More) Research Interest Waveform Design, Signal processing Data Compression Statistical Data Analysis, Machine Learning Remote Sensing Contact NAC Building, 8/212 Department Of Computer Science The City College Of New York, CUNY, 138th Street and Convent Avenue, New York, NY 10031 Office: (212)-650-6261Labs: (212)-650-6295 (glasslab); (212)-650-6135 (syberia) Email: gladkova@cs.ccny.cuny.edu Copyright Â© 2012 Irina Gladkova | Template design by Andreas Viklund
